text: The Revenant may not be the movie Leonardo DiCaprio deserves an Academy Award for, but he is currently odds - on favorite to finally win the Oscar for Best Actor at this Sunday's show. It's been a long time coming : DiCaprio has been nominated for acting Oscars four times prior. DiCaprio earned a nod this year for his role as frontiersman Hugh Glass in the Alejandro Iñárritu - directed drama. His competition : Bryan Cranston ( Trumbo ), Matt Damon ( The Martian ), Michael Fassbender ( Steve Jobs ) and Eddie Redmayne ( The Danish Girl ).
